core_attributes_media_type: Purpose: Identify the type of media present in the creative. Check whether it is an image, video, carousel, or gif. Provide the type of media as one of the following options: 'image', 'video', 'carousel', or 'gif'. Do not include any other types.
core_attributes_aspect_ratio: Purpose: Identify the aspect ratio of the creative. Check for common aspect ratios such as '1:1', '4:5', '9:16', '16:9', or 'other'. Provide the exact aspect ratio or 'other' if it does not fit these categories.
core_attributes_duration_bucket: Purpose: Determine the duration of the creative and categorize it into one of the following buckets: 'under_6s', '6_15s', '15_30s', '30_60s', 'over_60s'. Provide the category that best fits the creative's duration.
core_attributes_duration_seconds: Purpose: Determine the exact duration of the creative in seconds. The value should be between 0 and 300 seconds.
core_attributes_hook_type: Purpose: Identify the type of opening hook used in the creative. This could be a question, statistic, shock element, curiosity, problem, benefit, story, social proof, challenge, or none. Choose from the provided options.
core_attributes_pacing: Purpose: Determine the pacing of the creative. It can be 'slow', 'medium', 'fast', or 'variable'. Choose the pacing that fits best with the overall tempo of the creative.
core_attributes_scene_count: Purpose: Count the number of distinct scenes in the creative. Provide the number of scenes as a float, ensuring the value is between 1 and 50.
core_attributes_cut_frequency: Purpose: Identify how often cuts occur in the creative. This can be 'none', 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'very_high'. Provide the option that best fits the creative's cut frequency.
core_attributes_primary_platform: Purpose: Determine the primary platform for the creative. Check for platforms such as 'tiktok', 'instagram_reels', 'instagram_feed', 'facebook_feed', 'youtube_shorts', 'youtube', or 'multi_platform'. Choose the option that fits best.
core_attributes_content_category: Purpose: Identify the primary content category of the creative. It could be 'product', 'lifestyle', 'educational', 'entertainment', 'testimonial', 'promotional', or 'brand'. Choose the category that best represents the creative.
core_attributes_cta_type: Purpose: Identify the type of call to action (CTA) in the creative. This could be 'shop_now', 'learn_more', 'sign_up', 'download', 'subscribe', 'link_in_bio', 'swipe_up', 'tap', or 'none'. Choose the appropriate option.
core_attributes_cta_placement: Purpose: Determine when the call to action (CTA) appears in the creative. It can be 'early', 'middle', 'end', 'throughout', or 'none'. Provide the appropriate placement for the CTA.
core_attributes_language: Purpose: Identify the primary language used in the creative. The options are 'english', 'spanish', 'other', or 'none'. Choose the appropriate language.
core_attributes_text_amount: Purpose: Determine the amount of text present on screen in the creative. It can be 'none', 'minimal', 'moderate', or 'heavy'. Choose the option that best fits the creative's text presence.
core_attributes_production_quality: Purpose: Identify the overall production quality of the creative. This can be 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'professional'. Choose the quality level that best represents the creative.
element_presence_has_person: Purpose: Check if a person is visible in the creative. Respond with 'true' if a person is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_face: Purpose: Check if a face is clearly visible in the creative. Respond with 'true' if a face is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_face_closeup: Purpose: Check if a face is in closeup shot in the creative. Respond with 'true' if a closeup of the face is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_product: Purpose: Determine if the product is visible in the creative. Respond with 'true' if the product is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_product_in_use: Purpose: Check if the product is being used or demonstrated in the creative. Respond with 'true' if the product is in use, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_packaging: Purpose: Check if the product packaging is visible in the creative. Respond with 'true' if packaging is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_text_overlay: Purpose: Check if text is overlaid on the creative. Respond with 'true' if text overlay is present, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_captions: Purpose: Determine if captions or subtitles are present in the creative. Respond with 'true' if captions are present, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_logo: Purpose: Determine if a logo is visible in the creative. Respond with 'true' if a logo is present, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_logo_intro: Purpose: Determine if the logo appears in the first 3 seconds of the creative. Respond with 'true' if the logo appears early, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_price: Purpose: Check if a price is displayed in the creative. Respond with 'true' if the price is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_discount: Purpose: Check if a discount or sale is mentioned in the creative. Respond with 'true' if a discount is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_countdown: Purpose: Determine if a countdown timer is present in the creative. Respond with 'true' if a countdown is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_before_after: Purpose: Check if a before/after comparison is present in the creative. Respond with 'true' if the comparison is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_split_screen: Purpose: Determine if the creative features a split-screen composition. Respond with 'true' if a split screen is used, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_green_screen: Purpose: Check if a green screen or virtual background is used in the creative. Respond with 'true' if a green screen is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_screen_recording: Purpose: Check if a screen recording or demo is included in the creative. Respond with 'true' if a screen recording is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_animation: Purpose: Determine if animated elements are present in the creative. Respond with 'true' if animation is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_motion_graphics: Purpose: Check if motion graphics or kinetic text is used in the creative. Respond with 'true' if motion graphics are present, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_testimonial_quote: Purpose: Determine if a customer quote or testimonial is visible in the creative. Respond with 'true' if a testimonial is present, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_review_stars: Purpose: Check if a review star rating is visible in the creative. Respond with 'true' if stars are visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_social_proof_number: Purpose: Determine if numbers representing social proof are visible, such as '5M sold'. Respond with 'true' if social proof is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_hands: Purpose: Determine if hands are visible in the creative, such as in unboxing or demo shots. Respond with 'true' if hands are visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_animal: Purpose: Check if animals are present in the creative. Respond with 'true' if an animal is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_food: Purpose: Check if food is visible in the creative. Respond with 'true' if food is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_nature: Purpose: Check if nature or an outdoor setting is visible in the creative. Respond with 'true' if nature is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_urban: Purpose: Determine if an urban or city setting is visible in the creative. Respond with 'true' if an urban setting is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
element_presence_has_interior: Purpose: Check if an indoor or interior setting is visible in the creative. Respond with 'true' if an interior setting is visible, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
format_types_is_ugc_style: Purpose: Determine if the creative has a user-generated content (UGC) aesthetic. Respond with 'true' if UGC style is present, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
format_types_is_testimonial: Purpose: Check if the creative uses a customer testimonial format. Respond with 'true' if a testimonial format is used, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
format_types_is_unboxing: Purpose: Check if the creative follows an unboxing/reveal format. Respond with 'true' if an unboxing format is used, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
format_types_is_tutorial: Purpose: Check if the creative follows a tutorial/how-to format. Respond with 'true' if a tutorial format is used, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
format_types_is_comparison: Purpose: Determine if the creative follows a comparison/vs format. Respond with 'true' if a comparison format is used, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
format_types_is_listicle: Purpose: Check if the creative follows a list format (e.g., top 5 reasons). Respond with 'true' if a listicle format is used, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
format_types_is_problem_solution: Purpose: Determine if the creative follows a problem-solution narrative. Respond with 'true' if this format is used, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
format_types_is_day_in_life: Purpose: Check if the creative follows a day-in-the-life format. Respond with 'true' if this format is used, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
format_types_is_asmr: Purpose: Determine if the creative has an ASMR (sensory) focus. Respond with 'true' if ASMR is used, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
format_types_is_reaction: Purpose: Check if the creative uses a reaction format. Respond with 'true' if a reaction format is used, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
format_types_is_duet_stitch: Purpose: Determine if the creative uses a duet/stitch format with other content. Respond with 'true' if this format is used, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
format_types_is_trend_based: Purpose: Check if the creative follows a trend-based format. Respond with 'true' if the creative is trend-based, otherwise 'false'. This is a boolean field.
